sentences.sContent: A teenage mother was accused of smothering her 3-month-old daughter.
sentences.sCn: 一个少女妈妈被指控闷死自己三个月大的女儿。

synos.tran: 使窒息；抑制；（用灰等）闷熄；忍住
窒息状态；令人窒息的浓烟

remMethod.val: s(看做she， 她) + mother(母亲) → 她快被母亲的爱弄得窒息 → 使窒息

trans.tranOther: to kill someone by putting something over their face to stop them breathing
